TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UITableViewRowAnimation extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration of animations used when rows are inserted or deleted from a table view.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewRowAnimation Automatic = int32(100)

Docs.summary: Allows the table view to choose an appropriate animation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewRowAnimation Bottom = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Inserted row/s slide up from the bottom, deleted row/s slide down.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewRowAnimation Fade = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Affected rows fade in/out of view.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewRowAnimation Left = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Inserted row/s slide in from the left, deleted row/s slide out to the left.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewRowAnimation Middle = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The table view tries to keep the location of affected cells centered in the table view.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewRowAnimation None = int32(5)

Docs.summary: There is no animation when cells are added or removed. The cell appears immediately, as if the table view had been reloaded.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewRowAnimation Right = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Inserted row/s slide in from the right, deleted row/s slide out to the right.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewRowAnimation Top = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Inserted row/s slide down from the top, deleted row/s slide up.
